Award_TaskObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Award_TaskObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Award_TaskObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: Reference to an existing Award Task to edit

Award_Task_Data.description: Flag indicating that the referenced Award Task should be deleted from the Award.

Award_TaskObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Award_TaskObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Award_Task_Data.description: Reference to the Award Task. Required when Delete is set.
The Award Task ID for referencing Award Tasks.

Award_Task_TypeObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Award_Task_TypeObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Award_Task_TypeObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Award_Task_Data.description: Reference to the Award Task Type, which defines the type of work to be completed.

validation.validation: Reference to an Award Task Type is required.
validation.description: Reference to an Award Task Type is required.

Award_Contract_LineObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Award_Contract_LineObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Award_Contract_LineObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Award_Task_Data.description: Reference to an Award Line on the Award Contract for the Award Task. Defaults to the primary Award Line.

validation.validation: The referenced Award Contract Line must be a line on the referenced Award Contract, or blank to use the primary line.
validation.description: The referenced Award Contract Line must be a line on the referenced Award Contract, or blank to use the primary line.

validation.validation: The referenced Award Line must be on an Award.
validation.description: The referenced Award Line must be on an Award.

Award_Task_Data.description: True if the award task will be used as a billing milestone on installments.

validation.validation: To submit the award task, ensure that the [Receivable Contract Line Reference ID] is associated with a billing schedule that has an installment billing type.

Award_Task_Data.description: The start date of the date range for which the Award Task applies.
The end date for the date range for which the Award Task applies.
The date on which the Award Task is due.
The date on which the Award Task was completed.

Award_Task_StatusObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Award_Task_StatusObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Award_Task_StatusObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Award_Task_Data.description: Reference to the current status of the Award Task. Defaults to the Award Task Status marked as default.

Financials_Attachment_Data.description: Text attribute identifying Content Type of the Attachment.
Text attribute identifying Filename of the Attachment.
Text attribute identifying Encoding of the Attachment.
Boolean attribute identifying whether the Attachment is compressed.

Award_Task_Data.description: Encapsulating element containing all Business Document Attachment data.

validation.validation: If a file name is specified for a Financial Attachment, File Content and Content Type are required.

Award_Task_Role_AssignmentObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Award_Task_Role_Assignment_Data.description: Roles assigned to the Award Tasks.
The Award Task Role Assignment ID. This is the Award Task Role Assignment unique identifier.

Award_Task_Role_GroupObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Award_Task_Role_Assignment_Data.description: Reference to the Role Group responsible for completing the Award Task. This can be either Grant, Award, Award Line Organization or Award Header Organization.

Role_UsageObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Role_UsageObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Role_UsageObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Award_Task_Role_Assignment_Data.description: Reference to Organization responsible for completing the Award Task. This must be specified if Award Line Organization or Award Header Organization is selected as Role Group Reference.

Security_GroupObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Security_GroupObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Award_Task_Role_Assignment_Data.description: Reference to the Role responsible for completing the Award Task. Must be a Role that is assignable on Company, Grant, a worktag on the referenced Award Line, or any hierarchies that roll up these organizations.

Award_Task_Data.description: Contains the Role Assignment information for an Award Task.

validation.validation: Role usage should be specified for Award Line and Award Header Organizations.
The referenced Role must be assignable on Company, Grant, a worktag on the referenced Award Contract Line, or any hierarchies that roll up these organizations.
validation.description: The referenced Role must be assignable on Company, Grant, a worktag on the referenced Award Contract Line, or any hierarchies that roll up these organizations.

description: Element containing enterable data for one Award Task.

validation.validation: You can't edit the billing milestone for [Award Task Reference ID] when the award task is a milestone on a billing schedule or installment.
